text: Apisai Domolailai (born 16 April 1989) is a Fijian rugby union player. He plays for 's rugby sevens team. He was named in the squad to the 2016 Summer Olympics. He made his debut for Fiji in 2012. He is the nephew of former Fijian international Isoa Domolailai. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Fijian rugby union players Category:Fijian international rugby sevens players Category:I-Taukei Fijian people Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Fiji Category:Olympic gold medalists for Fiji Category:Male rugby sevens players Category:Olympic medalists in rugby sevens Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Apisai Domolailai
